subject: Basketball
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amare Stoudemire, coming off injuries and swinging between hope and doubt, looks to carve out a niche with the Phoenix Suns and again make basketball a positive force in his life.
snippet: Amare Stoudemire, coming off injuries and swinging between hope and doubt, looks to carve out a niche with the Phoenix Suns and again make basketball a positive force in his life.
